author: poojaranjan
content:
When I didn’t see a meeting on the calendar, I assumed it was skipped due to Memorial Day — but it now looks like it was an error. 
Apologies for my absence. I’m glad the meeting was recorded — I’ve just uploaded it here: https://youtu.be/iZx1yYjIPfI
